Comment: I do the King's Pawn opening...
...and my opponent attacks my pawn in conjunction with the Scandinavian Defence...
...and I capture the pawn...
...and my opponent captures mine, with the Lasker variation...
Now I chase the queen with mine...
...but she attacks my king...
...so I block with mine.
Now she eyes up my c-pawn...
...but what was I thinking, chasing her...
...as I didn't see this coming?
So I attempt to cage the queen by bringing up a knight...
...my opponent also brings up a knight...
...and I line up my opponent's c-pawn...
...but it moves...
...but I advance my queen to the 7th rank, anyway...
...an the other knight comes out, to save all three pieces...
...so I cage the queen further by advancing my queen's pawn...
...and as the knight advances closer, to eye up some of my pieces...
...I read this by putting my knight on the rim to cover.
Now the other knight comes on the attack...
